name: unit4.block33.acmehr.directory
description: 1. Create GitHub repository (acme_hr_directory). Use the guided practice as a reference. 2. Create the departments and employees tables.  3. Seed the tables with some data.  4. Create express server. 5. Have express server listen.  6. Test your routes using curl and/or Postman, again using guided practice as a reference. 7. Submit your work in the space provided.
